## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install macrolearner in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure macrolearner package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to macrolearner
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/iamsurajkumar/macrolearner):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/iamsurajkumar/macrolearner.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/iamsurajkumar/macrolearner)

``` sh
$ conda install -c iamsurajkumar macrolearner
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/macrolearner/)

``` sh
$ pip install macrolearner
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/iamsurajkumar/macrolearner)’s
[pages](https://iamsurajkumar.github.io/macrolearner/). Additionally you
can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/iamsurajkumar/macrolearner) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/macrolearner/) respectively.
